name: @finos/tracdap-web-api
description: API package for building web applications on the TRAC Data & Analytics Platform

scripts.tracVersion:windows: for /f %v in ('powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ..\..\..\dev\version.ps1') do npm version "%v"
scripts.compliance-licenses: license-checker-rseidelsohn --onlyAllow "MIT; Apache-2.0; BSD; BSD-3-Clause; ISC; BSD-2-Clause; Unlicense; WTFPL" --excludePackages "spdx-exceptions;spdx-license-ids" --json --out ../../../build/compliance/web-api-licenses/license-report.json
